alarmClock

Interface AlarmClockInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AlarmClock

    public interface AlarmClockInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    The alarm clock item interface
    Author:
    Florian FAGNIEZ, Brian GOHIER, No√©mie RULLIER

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void arme(java.util.Date date)
      Arm the alarm clock at the given date
      void autoDisarme()
      Disarm the alarm clock automatically (that means when the alarm clock is ringing)
      void disarme()
      Disarm alarm clock manually
      java.util.Date getCurrentDate()
      Return the current date from the alarm clock
      java.util.Date getRingDate()
      Returns the date on which it should be ring

      Say if the alarm clock is currently in arming process

      Stop the alarm clock
